name: Heads and Hands
tagline: Build a better future for businesses and people
description:
We are a web & mobile app development company specializing in projects for the new generation stores, digital and delivery services, personal accounts, loyalty programs, booking systems, electronic exchanges and marketplaces. Â 
We launched products for Kaspersky, Land Rover, Lamoda, Leroy Merlin, ZakaZaka, Petrovich. Also took part in production of projects for Yandex, ABBYY, Mail.Ru and Tinkoff Bank.
